sourcesContent:
//component to display fetched data from server //Derick import React from 'react' function ProductCard({ name, price, image, description, category, rating,}){ function handleClick(){ console.log("Click") } return( <>
{name}

Category: {category}

Price: Ksh {price}

Description: {description}

Rating: {rating}/5

{count} items left

) } export default ProductCard;
